item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Best Quality Products

Join The Elegant Home

mirrors and clothes stands from Elegant Home is crafted using high-quality materials to ensure durability and timeless beauty. Whether you're decorating your bedroom, living room, or hallway, our elegant pieces add a sophisticated touch to any space. Our clothes stands provide a practical yet stylish solution for organizing your clothes, while our mirrors enhance light and space in your home.

Shop now

Free Shipping

on order over 50 JOD

Certified

Premium quality

Dedicated Support

customer care

Secure Payment

Cash on delivery or Click

Best Selling Products

[products limit="4" columns="4" visibility="featured" category="Clothes stand,mirrors"]

Elegant Mirror Collection

Discover our range of high-quality mirrors in various shapes and styles

Shop Now

Clothing Stands

Perfect for organizing outfits or displaying pieces neatly—designed with both beauty and practicality

Shop Now

Space-Saving Design:

All our mirrors and clothes stands are crafted to enhance your room without taking up too much space

Shop Now

Get free delivery for orders over 50 JD

Shop Now

Customers Reviews

 5/5 .The mirror I bought completely changed the look of the living room. The golden frame adds a luxurious touch, and the delivery was very fast. Thank you, Elegant Noor Ahmad

The trust of our customers is our truest testimony

Shop Now  5/5 The clothing stand from Elegant Home is perfect! It holds all my heavy coats effortlessly, and the minimalist design matches my bedroom aesthetic perfectly. Super easy to assemble too Ali Ahmad

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Store Policy

Welcome to our store, your go-to place for mirrors and stands! We care about your satisfaction and want to make your shopping experience clear and simple.

1. Product Preview Before Purchase

    • We offer a product preview service so you can see the item in person before making a decision.

    • This service is available in select areas. Please contact us to confirm availability based on your location.

2. Delivery

    • We deliver your order within 24 hours anywhere in Jordan.

    • Fast and secure delivery right to your doorstep.

3. "Your Space" Service (Klelek)

    • Not sure what fits your space?

    • Use our "Klelek" service — just send us a photo of your space, and we’ll help you choose the mirror or stand that fits your style and area best.

4. Payment

    • We offer Cash on Delivery or Bank Transfer / E-wallets.

    • Orders are confirmed after final agreement.

5. Return & Exchange

    • No returns or exchanges after purchase.

    • That’s why we provide a preview option — to make sure you are completely satisfied before buying.

6. Customer Support

For any questions or assistance, contact us via:

    • Instagram: @your_instagram

    • Facebook: Your Facebook Page
